definition.text: At runtime some nodes might aquire a value, and when it is expected that the value is a number, this type of error will pop up. To avoid this to happen Make sure that at nodes that should have only numeric values, that they don't get by any means a non numeric one.

paragraphs.text: Left click and Edit to enter edit mode and change this text. ENTER to write new paragraphs. ESC to exit edit mode. Then you can use docs.save to save your changes and app.contribute to send it to the main repository.
